title: Bring on Diwali with celeb-inspired brocade trend
text: If the idea of stepping out in heavier-than-your-body-weight lehengas making you want to ditch those Diwali events, we’ve got some good news for you. If you’re not the kind of person who likes to go all OTT with your Diwali looks, the brocade trend is tailor-made for you. While it's traditional and looks opulent, brocade silhouettes are also light-weight and functional. It will help you dance the night away in comfort. Kareena Kapoor Khan and Tara Sutaria made the perfect case for this trend, by looking festive-ready in these brocade ensembles, without comprising on the glamour quotient. Here’s a list of celebrities who will convince you to invest in a brocade kurta, lehenga or Anarkali for all the upcoming soirees you’re planning to attend.
description: Take cues from Kareena Kapoor Khan and Tara Sutaria on how to experiment with the brocade trend this festive season.
